entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 2004/6. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.
entry.dcterms:creator: Vámos, Orsolya

entry.dcterms:description: 1. Public judgement of the current political situation 2. Habits and culture of mobile phone use in Hungary 3. Public opinion about the operation of pharmacies and the reform of pharmacy services 4. Habits of second-hand car purchase of the Hungarian population 5. Judgement of the economic situation of the country, opinions about personal financial situation, job opportunities

health care and medical treatment
labour and employment
mass political behavior, attitudes
transport, travel (and mobility)
person
survey data
cross-section
A 1000-person, random probability sample with supplementary addresses, nationally representative of the Hungarian adult population.
face-to-face interview
